ArgonTest.Name: Token instance (concrete param)
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
trait MyTrait public proc self.say_hello(): () do puts "Hello World" end end
token instance MyInst(x: String): MyTrait end
proc do_say_hello(token t: MyTrait): () = t.say_hello()
proc main(): () do do_say_hello (MyInst "Hello") end
